Html:
Hi,

Thank you for your great plugin and wonderful support.

I want to use custom image instead of stars and I can not sort it out. my rating image is a simple rounded corner rectangle . I created a gif file which is 36*32 and has 3 vertically aligned elements.

1-empty (black)

2-hover over(yellow)

3- selected (red)

I can not reproduce my image correctly in the output.

Appreciate your help.

Golnaz
I think the starwidth and starheigth has to be set . I did not know that they has a default value of 16 !
Correct. Does it work for you now?
